Posts.Content: disneyfan78 wrote: Hello Ladies,  I have a few questions and I hope someone will be able to answer. This April I found a lump in my right breast above my nipple. I had an ultrasound and the Dr said it was nothing to be concerned with. Well FF to this month, the first lump is now much bigger. Thick, about an inch long deep inside my breast. I just thought I would check out my armpit and found even more lumps, some small and some larger. Round and hard. They do not move very well, but if I try and can budge them. So questions: Has anyone one ever had this? Did they hurt? I have another ultrasound tomorrow at 1:30pm~ I am doing all I can to keep it together and not let my mind play tricks on me. Thanks Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Lumps, Lumps and more Lumps disneyfan78 disneyfan78

Posts.Content: Oct 27, 2011 12:16PM disneyfan78 wrote: Thank you for the words of encouragement! I am going in today at 1:30pm for the US, I am nervous but coping!  Praying for the best!
